Entities.Name: Observation
Entities.Definition: Specific terms representing abnormal features like lesions or opacities.
Entities.Sample Data: 'nodule' and 'lung cancer' identified by radiologists as observations.

Entities.Name: Clinical Finding
Entities.Definition: Terms identified by radiologists based on the observations, indicating clinical conditions or diseases.
Entities.Sample Data: 'lung cancer' identified from the observation of a 'nodule'.

Entities.Name: Modifier
Entities.Definition: Descriptive terms that modify the observations and clinical findings such as size, shape, or anatomic location.

Dataset.Name: In-house Chest CT Reports
Dataset.Details: A collection of 540 annotated chest CT reports from a specific institution used for training and evaluating the model.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Detailed guidelines provided to medical experts for annotating the reports, including examples and definitions for each entity type.
Annotation Guidelines.Link: No direct link available in the document, but supplementary materials might include further details.
